captions.text:
love problem?
love problem?
first rank ??
mine too!
It's not first rank or second rank ! It's FASTRACK!
The first time I saw her,
there was nothing like lighting, flowers or rain.
My heart just skipped a beat.
It was like a dream
"Hmm...tell me more!"
This drunkard describing me?
Rather, I'd describe him.
His name is Sanjay

Since Jalsa film got released,
he fixed his name to be Sanjay Sahu.
He's crazy about 3 things
1) Pawan Kalyan
2) Power Star
3...you expected it right - Power Star Pawan Kalyan
He started worshipping Pawan Kalyan
since his high school days when Badri movie released.
After every film release of his idol,
he begins to live that character
After Gabbar Singh's release,
he irritated me with his Guns, Belts and Khaki Outfits!
" My madness comes with its own limits "

" Come come come...
won't we?? We'll come !!"
His craziness doesn't have limits!
You're wondering how we met?
He used to come daily
to the Pani Puri center near my home.
I thought he was followng me but
realized that it was mefollowing him
But one day ...
See those looks he is stealing?
Actually...that's how I fell for him
Madam, I don't have change!
I wonder what made me eat here when
hyderabad has so many panipuri centers?
hello
hello excuse me
Please take the change
It's okay, not required
Please take it, I insist!
Can we walk and talk? If you don't mind?
If you don't mind!
Okay!
what's your name?
Sandhya!
Oh! Nice name!
Nice name? 2 out of every 10 girls have the same name!
Your name?
Sanjay... Sanjay Sahu !!
What do you do?
B.Tech final year.
And you?
I finished engineering and am doing films.

"Okay...bye!"
"okay bye"
Hey I can't find my phone,
can you give your phone once?
(hesitant)
Oh! I got it!
Thank you!
Sandhya, can I ask you something?
What is it?
Sandhya, whom do you like the most?
My dad!
That's not what I meant Sandhya!
Pawan Kalyan, Mom, Dad – these are all common answers
besides them, whom do you like in a personal, special kind of way?
What do you mean when you walk away smiling like that?
Yes, we are in a relation.
The guy whose image I had in my eyes
is now right in front of me.
We roamed around the entire city of Hyderabad
From Dilsukhnagar to Indranagar
from Nampalli to Lingampalli
Petrol inflation might have affected
the auto & taxi drivers but not us!
Up until now
you heard her ramble. Now listen to my side of the story
one fine friday
I heavily snoozed after I boozed.
She called up and asked to meet her urgently
When I asked what had happened, she replied "nothing".
That day I realized that
when a woman says "nothing", it means more than everything.

"Hi"
"I'm in no high mood to say hi to you"
Sandhya what happened?
You're angry at me?
Because I boozed?
You booze too?
(groans)
You booze or dance like footloose, I don't care!
Did you give the hoodie that I gifted you, to someone else?
Chill, a friend of mine needed it for a short film, so I gave it to him.
So you might end up giving away your girlfriend also?
Are you and the hoodie the same to me?
Don't talk meaninglessly!
No, YOU try to understand and talk!
You know, meeting you itself was a disaster!

I always regret in life that inspite of
Hyderabad having so many panipuri centers

what made me eat at
that place near your home?
Really? If so, having your phone in the pockets,
you lied as if you couldnt find it and asked for mine to give a missed call? Overaction!

Oh is that so? What did you say then?
You followed me everyday

to the pani puri center?
Didn't you say so?
You couldn't understand my love even once!
Was it me who never understood?
I built a temple for you in my heart. Did you atleast build a grave for me in yours? ''Note this down sambadu"
I always knew you'd use me like curry leaves in your food
Useful only for the cooking but not eating
''Ah! Sambadu, write this down too!"
Look at me still talking to you. I must be dumb
Thank God! I got to know that piece of news at least now!
Go to hell !
This is what happened, boss.
The lost love story of sandhya and sanjay
Why don't you relate your story too boss
Sindhu. She's extremely beautiful
You can't stop looking at her
When she speaks, it feels like the world is on pause
She teases those who are laughing
and cheers up those who are crying
Anyway, I don't have the chance to narrate here
You go on!
Thanks! When I told people I was this guy's girlfriend, I lost my self-respect!
He is afraid he has to pay at public toilets
so he keeps watering walls and trees
He doesn't have enough food to eat,
but uses hair gel for his head!
He is the biggest example for the
most miserly people known to men
His name doesn't do much to help either
P. Narasimha
Everyone calls him P.Na.Si (miser in telugu)
I took him to many restaurants in the city to feed this man
From soups to salads,
starters to desserts
...he eats it all.
He makes me pay the bill
and pays tips to the waiter as if he were the producer of a big movie
When I'm paying, he suggests Novotel
If he's paying, he suggests coffee hotel
If I'm paying, he suggests going in a cab
But if he's paying, he suggests taking the local metro
By the way, he has another qualification
Except a cycle, he can't drive any vehicle!
You can't ask for a lift to a guy who can't drive
You shouldn't ask for a gift from a miser
..and from this character, you shouldn't ask anything!
This pile of misfortune came into my life thus . . .
(oh my God)

. . . one minute please "
"who are you?"
what do you want?
why did you come?
why are you following me?
... wait ... i am panting...
i love you
what?
i...love...you
what? do you propose as soon as you see someone?
what did you see that you proposed?
There are only 2 beautiful things in Hyderabad
One is necklace road, the other one is you!
I can't oppose either one, right?
Suppose I oppose?
Then I'll propose! Again!
You were flattered by that one silly dialogue?
I've written many such lines
Should I give you another?

For milk to be curds, it needs curds to be on its side
for me to be complete, I need you by my side
(phone rings)
Hi
What are you doing?
Nothing
Wanna go out somewhere?
Where should we go?
Barista?
I can't bear it!
mm...coffee day?
You wanna go to coffee day on Independence day?
P.Na.Si!! (miser)
Did you ever buy me one gift?
(mumbles)
You make me buy everything you want
If I object, you start with your dialogues
The other day, my friend Akhila's boyfriend
gave her a tablet. Do you know?
I can't give you money, but
if you're sick, why a tablet...
...I'd even give you tonic!
Tablet does not mean that!
"Samsung tablet"
oh
Okay. All you need is a gift, right?
We'll meet tomorrow.

"Even after this description of me, if she thought
I'd buy her an expensive gift, it is her mistake"
Two coke!
(Ugh...she found out. The witch!)
What is this?
You kept saying "gift, gift"...
so here's one!
Exactly...WHAT is it?
More than the happiness that I gave you a gift
you seem to be irritated that it is cheap!

You are the one who is trying to cover it up like
a costly purchase even though it's from Koti

You shouldn't be looking at the cost.
Look at the taste. The taste!
Your taste? Forget it!
Such a big waste!
Because you're such a waste, you're with me!
I'm already prepared that our pair would be under repair some day
Sure..you would. Why wouldn't you?
Had I walked behind a politician on his road trip,
I'd have gotten an MLA or MP ticket
What did I get running behind you? A pickle?!

Your face is like a nasty guy who begs for a
low class ticket at the IMAX theatre

Your face is like the one who collects used
lemons from the roadside and makes lemon rice!

You remind me of someone who warms
fruit juice in an oven!

Your face would not know the difference
between Haleem and Halwa!
Hey! You ordered the coke! Who will pay?!
In any case, it is better to be single than with Sindhu.
My girlfriend is his ex, his ex is my girlfriend!

"Please take the change!"
"Who will pay the change?"
--- Credits ---

title: X Change || Telugu Latest Short Film on Love 2015|| Presented By Runway reel

comments.text:
Pros: Sandhya's acting in first part and dialogues in the second part. 
Pawan movie dialogues are also utilized properly. Characterization was also 
good. Good Job people :) Cons : I didn't see a point for the title " 
X-change" expect for the last dialogue. ? why was it even necessary to have 
such an end ? End could have been different and better. BGM could have been 
better. I'm no critic or something. it's just that you guys have done a 
good job and Hope you would give you best the next time.
